about_the_game:
Delve. Explore. Discover. But most importantly, get out of the Dark Passage alive. Be the first to discover hundreds of ancient artifacts in this first person treasure hunt inspired by classic early 3D dungeon crawlers.

After the disappearance of a world-renowned archaeologist and treasure hunter on the Shothran Isles makes headlines, you're contacted by a wealthy collector. This mysterious figure is willing to pay top dollar for someone who can explore the caves and emerge with a pack full of ancient artifacts.
  • Climb, grapple, and rappel through an expansive cave system filled with ancient ruins
  • Carefully unearth and preserve hundreds of unique artifacts
  • Manage your artifact storage carefully to avoid damage and keep their condition intact

Finding these artifacts is one thing, but escaping with them won't be so simple.
  • Solve cryptic puzzles, translate ancient writing systems, and decipher the mysteries of the labyrinthine ruins
  • Avoid deadly traps and stave off ancient curses

Remember to never let your guard down. For you're not the only one seeking the secrets of Shothran...
  • Use stealth to evade rival hunters
  • Fight the creatures that dwell in the deeps with whatever you can find
  • Or, lose it all and perish, forgotten to time
  • Compete for a spot on the Steam Leaderboards for the first discovery of every treasure, as well as the highest loot value and time trials

Do you have what it takes to make a name for yourself as a treasure hunter in the Dark Passage?

name: Dark Passage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-3220 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-8250U CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Delve. Explore. Discover. But most importantly, get out of the Dark Passage alive. Be the first to discover hundreds of ancient artifacts in this first person treasure hunt inspired by classic early 3D dungeon crawlers.
